menu.name: Pepperoni
menu.ingredients: Hand-tossed dough, house-made tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and savory pepperoni

menu.name: Margherita
menu.ingredients: Hand-tossed dough, tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, vine-ripened tomatoes, fresh basil, and extra virgin olive oil.

menu.name: Prosciutto
menu.ingredients: Hand-tossed dough, tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, thinly sliced prosciutto, arugula, shaved Parmesan, and extra virgin olive oil.

menu.name: Patron
menu.ingredients: Hand-stretched dough, tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, pepperoni, Italian sausage, green bell peppers, red onions, mushrooms, and black olives.
